attributes.action: dissolve parliament immediately, prosecute MPs profiting through the parliamenary expenses system and seek repayment of claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The revelations that MPs have been routinely abusing the taxpayer funded parliamentary expenses system and using it for personal gain, and in total disregard of moral obligations means that the British public have lost all confidence in parliament. Parliament should be dissolved; MPs who made dishonest claims should be prosecuted and claims which cannot be shown to be within the spirit of the rules, namely: "Claims should be above reproach and must reflect actual usage of the resources being claimed; Claims must only be made for expenditure that it was
necessary for a Member to incur to ensure that he or she could properly perform his or her parliamentary duties. (Green Book) - should be repaid, by compulsion is necessary.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
